name: Kreating love
description:
Welcome to Kreating love, KERV's first Web embedded and interactive Visual Novel!  KERV is also affiliated under the names kerv.co on Instagram and kervart.co!  Meet the Kreator! She's a laid back gal when she's not ruling over her universe named: The Spektrum Other than that, she'd make a great person for you to make friends with! (or maybe more???)

*Please continue below to read more as described by KERV herself!


You can choose to date or be-friend the Kreator! Ultimately, it is for you to decide where you'd like to go with her relationship-wise.

This game is short as it was a little test. I'm learning how to use Ren'py and I'm trying to make a steady and gradual effort into the indie developing world. So, in short, this is the first game I've ever made and published! (That's also If you don't count the mini ones I made on my TI-84 calculators-)

  • Chance to date the Kreator, and in her date fit too! 
  • Have the chance to gain a best friend! 
  • Have the chance to have a cool new fictional gf!!! (???) 
  • 10 minutes of gameplay (give or take) 
  • An exciting chance to find out what else could be in store in the future!!!!!
Instead of a FAQ, it's an ATPQ aka Answer To Possible Questions! Clever right?

Q: How can I play the game?

A: This game can only be played on a browser at the moment! I'm still testing out a lot of things, and I need to make sure that I learn how to do everything the right way :')

Q: How long did it take you to make this game?

A: I'm not even going to lie to you right now... Under 24 hours, and that's even including the time I took to make little tweaks here and there. Again, this game was made to help me learn the basics so I can gradually get myself ready for a big project.

Q: Who's "the Kreator"?

A: She is basically, in lament terms, the head honcho of the universe in which my characters reside. There's more to come about her and other characters, maybe not in this game, but maybe that'll be a project for me in the future :)

In the meantime, you can get to know some of the other important figures in the Spektrum Universe here. 

Q: Who made the art and the sprites?

A: I did! Before nerding out and trying to involve myself in coding a visual novel world, I've been consistently and proudly making art for six years! You can find more of my art here!

Q: Where is the music from? Who made it?

A: I was thankful enough to find and have the ability to use music from oo39.com! It's a small company located in Hokkaido, Japan, and they make music for people to use in their games, commercials, etc. I recommend you check out their work, and for those who want to know the specific tracks for certain parts of the game, they're tracks ys157, ys126, and ys176!

Hope you enjoy what you see and stay for what is to come! if you'd like to follow along with KERV's art, dev, and life journey click the photo!
